NK040(thi)044:1: // ma cig lab kyi sgron ma'i bskang ba bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)044:3: 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)044:4: yum chen shes rab phar phyin gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:5: thugs dam bskang ba'i gnas 'dir byon //
NK040(thi)044:7: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi ldan //
NK040(thi)044:8: g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje bsnams //
NK040(thi)044:9: g.yon gyi dang po ting nge 'dzin //
NK040(thi)044:10: 'og ma gnyis kyi mnyam bzhag mdzad //
NK040(thi)044:11: zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs //
NK040(thi)044:12: dbu skra nag po sil mar gyur //
NK040(thi)044:13: dar dang rin po che'i rgyan //
NK040(thi)044:14: yum chen shes rab phar phyin thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:15: thugs sprul lab sgron thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:16: chos sku'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)044:17: yum gyi thugs kyi sprul pa ni //
NK040(thi)044:18: ma cig lab kyi sgron ma ni //
NK040(thi)044:20: sprul pa du ma mdzad pa'i tshul //
NK040(thi)044:22: nub phyogs o rgyan gnas mchog nas //
NK040(thi)044:23: rdo rje phag mo gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:24: thugs dam bskang ba'i gnas 'dir byon //
NK040(thi)044:25: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ldan //
NK040(thi)044:26: g.yas pas gri gug thur du bzung //
NK040(thi)044:27: g.yon pas thod khrag gyen du rol //
NK040(thi)044:28: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhengs //
NK040(thi)044:29: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du bardzesa //
NK040(thi)044:30: mi mgo rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
NK040(thi)044:31: sku mdog dkar ba dmar mdangs bkra //
NK040(thi)044:32: gcig bu'i lus la gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)044:34: rje btsun ma'i thugs dam mkha' spyod ma'i thugs dam
NK040(thi)044:35: rdo rje phag mo'i thugs ma cig lab sgron ye
NK040(thi)044:36: shes mkha' 'gro'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyi h'u /
NK040(thi)044:37: ma cig lab sgron sprul pa ni //
NK040(thi)044:38: po ta la yi gnas mchog nas //
NK040(thi)044:39: rje btsun sgrol ma gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:40: thugs dam bskang ba'i gnas 'dir byon //
NK040(thi)044:42: zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhi ba'i sku //
NK040(thi)044:43: zhabs gnyis g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)044:44: phyag g.yas mchod sbyin ud pa la //
NK040(thi)044:45: g.yon pas mnyam bzhag pad+ma bsnams //
NK040(thi)044:46: dbu skra ral pa'i thor cog can //
NK040(thi)044:47: kha dog dar gyi na bzang dang //
NK040(thi)044:48: rin po che'i rgyan gyis spras //
NK040(thi)044:49: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:50: dam tshig lha tshogs thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:51: rlung bskyed ma'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:52: ma cig lab sgron ye shes mkha' 'gro'i h'u /
NK040(thi)044:53: ma cig lab sgron sprul pa ni //
NK040(thi)044:54: rgya gar gnas mchog dam pa nas //
NK040(thi)044:55: lha mo sgyu 'phrul gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:56: thugs dam bskang ba'i gnas 'dir byon //
NK040(thi)044:57: sku mdog u dum wa ra'i mdog /
NK040(thi)044:58: zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhi 'dzum ldan //
NK040(thi)044:59: zhabs gnyis zhi bde'i tshul du bzhugs //
NK040(thi)044:60: phyag gnyis bde gshegs bskyed mdzad ma //
NK040(thi)044:61: sku la rin chen rgyan cha mdzes //
NK040(thi)044:62: dar gos na bza' lhab lhub can //
NK040(thi)044:63: lha mo sgyu 'phrul thugs dam yum chen lha tshogs
NK040(thi)044:64: thugs sangs rgyas bskyed yum ma cig lab sgron thugs
NK040(thi)044:66: ma cig lab sgron sprul pa ni //
NK040(thi)044:67: sum cu rtsa gsum lha yi yul //
NK040(thi)044:68: nor bu'i phun tshogs gnas mchog nas //
NK040(thi)044:69: mkha' 'gro ser mo gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:70: thugs dam bskang ba'i gnas 'dir byon //
NK040(thi)044:71: sku mdog ser mo gser mdog can //
NK040(thi)044:72: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum bgrad //
NK040(thi)044:73: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul gyi bzheng //
NK040(thi)044:74: g.yas pas gri gug nam mkhar phyar //
NK040(thi)044:75: g.yon pas thod khrag thugs kar 'dzin //
NK040(thi)044:76: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du bardzesa //
NK040(thi)044:77: gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan drug spras //
NK040(thi)044:78: thod skam lnga yi dbu la brgyan //
NK040(thi)044:79: thod rlon lnga bcu'i do shal byas //
NK040(thi)044:80: gsang sngags u dum wa ra yi //
NK040(thi)044:81: lha rnam 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)044:82: mkha' 'gro ser mo'i thugs lha yi mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:83: gsang sngags ston pa'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:84: ma cig lab sgron ye shes mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:86: ma cig lab sgron sprul pa ni //
NK040(thi)044:87: rgya gar ser skya'i gnas mchog nas //
NK040(thi)044:88: sprul pa pan chen gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:89: thugs dam bskang ba'i gnas 'dir byon //
NK040(thi)044:90: sku mdog mi sha'i ngang nyid la //
NK040(thi)044:91: zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa //
NK040(thi)044:92: zhabs gnyis skyil mo krung du bzhugs //
NK040(thi)044:93: lhung bzed mkhar sil po ti bsnams //
NK040(thi)044:94: srab 'jam reg bya'i sham thab dang //
NK040(thi)044:95: chos gos rnam gsum sku la mnab //
NK040(thi)044:96: nyan thos bslab pa phra rag bsrung //
NK040(thi)044:97: mu steg 'bum tsho bcu bdun ni //
NK040(thi)044:98: nang pa'i sde la btsud par mdzad //
NK040(thi)044:100: pan+di ta'i thugs bstan pa'i bdag po'i nag phyogs btul
NK040(thi)044:101: ba'i ma cig lab sgron ye shes mkha' 'gro'i thugs
NK040(thi)044:103: ma cig lab sgron sprul pa ni //
NK040(thi)044:104: bod yul gnas mchog dam pa nas //
NK040(thi)044:105: ye shes mtsho rgyal gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:106: thugs dam bskang ba'i gnas 'dir byon //
NK040(thi)044:107: sku mdog gcig tu ma nges pa //
NK040(thi)044:108: zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhi dang ldan //
NK040(thi)044:109: zhabs gnyis mnyam por bshib nas bzhengs //
NK040(thi)044:110: dbu skra len phran sil bur gyur //
NK040(thi)044:111: phyag gnyis thabs shes phyag rgya mdzad //
NK040(thi)044:112: na bza' kha dog mdzes par gsol //
NK040(thi)044:113: nor bu rin chen rgyan dang ldan //
NK040(thi)044:114: gsang sngags zab mo'i gter sgo phyes //
NK040(thi)044:115: las 'phro can rnams de la bcud //
NK040(thi)044:116: gter chos spyod rnams 'gro don mdzad //
NK040(thi)044:117: ye shes mtsho rgyal thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:118: bod yul mkha' 'gro'i thugs mkhar chen baza'i gter kha
NK040(thi)044:119: phye ba'i ma cig lab sgron ye shes mkha' 'gro'i
NK040(thi)044:121: ma cig drang po sku sprul tshe //
NK040(thi)044:122: zangs ri mkhar nas gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:123: thugs dam bskang ba'i gnas 'dir byon //
NK040(thi)044:124: byang phyogs lab kyi grong khyer du //
NK040(thi)044:125: yab ni kher gad chos lha dang //
NK040(thi)044:126: yum ni phyug mo 'bum sgron ma //
NK040(thi)044:127: yab yum gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:128: thugs dam bskang phyir gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:129: de gnyis sras mo lab sgron ni //
NK040(thi)044:131: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ldan //
NK040(thi)044:132: zhabs gnyis gar stabs tshul du bzhugs //
NK040(thi)044:133: dbu skra nag po sil bur gyur //
NK040(thi)044:134: phyag g.yas gser gyi d+aa ru bsgrag /
NK040(thi)044:135: g.yon pas dngul dkar dril bu bsnams //
NK040(thi)044:136: rin chen rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
NK040(thi)044:137: sku la ras 'phrug na bza' mnab //
NK040(thi)044:138: kha t+w+aam ka ni yab phyir thog /
NK040(thi)044:139: zhi ba'i zhal 'dzum mdangs dang ldan //
NK040(thi)044:141: kha ba can rnams bde la bkod //
NK040(thi)044:142: lab kyi sgron ma'i yum gyi sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro'i
NK040(thi)044:143: gtso mo'i rigs bzhi bdag mo'i 'gro ba 'dren mdzad
NK040(thi)044:144: ma'i ye shes mkha' 'gro'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs
NK040(thi)044:146: ma cig shar du sprul pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)044:147: sku mdog sngon mo gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)044:148: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ldan //
NK040(thi)044:149: skra grol rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
NK040(thi)044:150: rin chen do shal cod pan mdzes //
NK040(thi)044:151: gri gug thod phrag kha t+w+aam 'dzin //
NK040(thi)044:152: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul gyi bzheng //
NK040(thi)044:154: ma cig lab sgron thugs mkha' 'gro 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas pa'i h'u /
NK040(thi)044:155: ma cig lho ru sprul pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)044:156: sku mdog ser mo gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)044:157: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ldan //
NK040(thi)044:158: skra grol mi mgo rus pas brgyan //
NK040(thi)044:159: rin po che dang cod pan mdzes //
NK040(thi)044:160: gri gug thod khrag kha t+w+aam ka /
NK040(thi)044:161: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul gyi bzhengs //
NK040(thi)044:163: ma cig lab sgron mkha' 'gro 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas pa'i h'u /
NK040(thi)044:164: ma cig nub na sprul pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)044:165: sku mdog dmar po gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)044:166: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ldan //
NK040(thi)044:167: skra grol mi mgo rus pas brgyan //
NK040(thi)044:168: rin po che dang cod pan mdzes //
NK040(thi)044:169: gri gug thod khrag kha t+w+aam thog /
NK040(thi)044:170: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul gyis bzhengs //
NK040(thi)044:172: ma cig lab sgron thugs dam mkha' 'gro 'bum 'khor dang bcas pa'i h'u /
NK040(thi)044:173: ma cig byang nas spru'i pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)044:174: sku mdog ljang khu gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)044:175: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ldan //
NK040(thi)044:176: skra grol mi mgo rus pa'i rgyan //
NK040(thi)044:177: rin po che dang cod pan mdzes //
NK040(thi)044:178: gri gug thod khrag kha t+w+aam thog /
NK040(thi)044:179: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul gyi bzhengs //
NK040(thi)044:181: ma cig lab sgron mkha' 'gro 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas h'u /
NK040(thi)044:182: ma cig dbus su sprul pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)044:183: sku mdog dkar mo 'bum mdangs can //
NK040(thi)044:184: zhal cig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ldan //
NK040(thi)044:185: skra grol mi mgo rus pas brgyan //
NK040(thi)044:186: rin po che dang cod pan mdzes //
NK040(thi)044:187: gri gug thod khrag kha t+w+aam thogs //
NK040(thi)044:188: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul gyis bzhengs //
NK040(thi)044:190: ma cig lab sgron mkha' 'gro 'bum gyis 'khor dang bcas pa'i h'u /
NK040(thi)044:191: ma cig mtshams su sprul pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)044:192: sku mdog sna tshogs gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)044:193: zhal gcig phyag gnyis skra grol rin po che dang
NK040(thi)044:194: gri gug thod khrag zhabs gnyis rang 'dra'i sna tshogs
NK040(thi)044:195: 'bum gyis bskor // ma cig lab sgron thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:197: ma gnyen sa ri khrod 'grim tsa na //
NK040(thi)044:198: g.ya' ri gangs rtser bzhugs pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)044:199: yi dam lha tshogs thibs se thib //
NK040(thi)044:200: dpa' bo'i gro brdung khregs se khreg /
NK040(thi)044:201: dpa' mo'i nyams dbyangs 'u ru ru //
NK040(thi)044:202: mkha' 'gro mang po dpungs se dpung //
NK040(thi)044:203: gdon tshogs mang po mya la la //
NK040(thi)044:204: gnad kyi gdam pa sha ra ra //
NK040(thi)044:205: bdud kyi gcod thabs si li li //
NK040(thi)044:206: lta ba'i 'brug sgra ti ri ri //
NK040(thi)044:207: bsgom pa'i glog dmar khyugs se khyug /
NK040(thi)044:208: spyod pa'i thog sgra sha ra ra //
NK040(thi)044:210: brgyan cha mang po khra la la //
NK040(thi)044:211: rol mo mang po ti ri ri //
NK040(thi)044:212: dar gyi cod pan pu ru ru //
NK040(thi)044:213: glu len gar byed khyugs se khyug /
NK040(thi)044:214: d+aa ru cang te khra la la //
NK040(thi)044:215: dril bu g.yer ka si li li //
NK040(thi)044:216: mi rkang gling bu kyu ru ru //
NK040(thi)044:217: phata kyi sgra skad zangs se zang //
NK040(thi)044:218: sha chen gyi dud pa ti ri ri //
NK040(thi)044:219: tshil chen gyi sgron me ya la la //
NK040(thi)044:220: ma cig lab sgron ri khrod 'grims ma'i rigs bzhi
NK040(thi)044:221: mkha' 'gro'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i ma gzhan yang phyogs
NK040(thi)044:223: bskyed rdzogs gnyis la brtan pa thob //
NK040(thi)044:224: gzung 'dzin gnyis la mdud pa grol //
NK040(thi)044:225: thabs shes gnyis kyi spyod pa mdzad //
NK040(thi)044:226: bka' brgyud gdung brgyud sras brgyud skyed //
NK040(thi)044:227: snang stong dbyer med mkha' dbyings dag /
NK040(thi)044:229: sems bskyed bar snang 'ja' ltar bkra //
NK040(thi)044:230: byams dang snying rje rgyud la skye //
NK040(thi)044:231: chags sdang nye ring gnyis dang bral //
NK040(thi)044:232: gzhan don phyogs med lhun gyis grub //
NK040(thi)044:233: ma cib lab sgron thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:234: gzhan don mthar phyin 'gro ba 'dren ma'i h'u /
NK040(thi)044:235: ma cig lab kyi sgron ma la //
NK040(thi)044:236: bdag nyid dad pa'i thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:237: khyed kyi yon tan phrin las kyi //
NK040(thi)044:239: phyi ma'i don la 'bad pa dang //
NK040(thi)044:240: dkar po'i dal kha spel du gsol //
NK040(thi)044:241: nag po'i bdud rnams bzlog tu gsol //
NK040(thi)044:242: zas nor longs spyod char bzhin phob //
NK040(thi)044:243: lha 'dre mi gsum dbang du bsdus //
NK040(thi)044:244: dgra bgegs gnod byed rdul du bzlog /
NK040(thi)044:245: sdang ba'i dgra la rtags phyung cig /
NK040(thi)044:246: gnod pa'i bgegs la las mdzod cig /
NK040(thi)044:247: bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)044:248: ma cig lab sgron thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)044:249: ma cig bskang ba'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK040(thi)044:250: bdag gi bsam pa chos la bsgyur //
NK040(thi)044:251: ci bsam don rnams 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)044:252: bdag mkha' spyod gnas su lam sna drangs //
NK040(thi)044:254: ma skye med ngang du gshegs pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)044:255: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i bsu ma byed //
NK040(thi)044:256: lha dang lha mo thams cad kyi //
NK040(thi)044:257: 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i gur khang phub //
NK040(thi)044:259: me tog char pa sna tshogs 'bab //
NK040(thi)044:260: dri ngad ldan pa'i dud pa btang //
NK040(thi)044:261: rol mo bye brag tu sgrog /
NK040(thi)044:262: gar dang dbyangs kyi mchod pa 'bul //
NK040(thi)044:263: ma cig seng+ge chib nas su //
NK040(thi)044:266: nam mkha'i dbyings nas gshegs nas kyang //
NK040(thi)044:267: sprul pa'i 'gro don mdzad gyur na //
NK040(thi)044:268: chos nyid ngang las gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)044:269: ma cig lab sgron 'gro don mdzad pa'i chos kyi
NK040(thi)044:270: dbyings ma'i skye med ston ma'i thugs dam khyed kyi
NK040(thi)044:273: ma gti mug dag nas chos dbyings ngang //
NK040(thi)044:274: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i zhe sdang dag nas me long ngang //
NK040(thi)044:275: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i nga rgyal dag nas mnyam nyid ngang //
NK040(thi)044:276: rin chen mkha' 'gro'i 'dod chags dag nas sor rtog ngang //
NK040(thi)044:277: pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i phrag dog dag nas bya grub ngang //
NK040(thi)044:278: las kyi mkha' 'gro'i ye shes mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i
NK040(thi)044:279: 'khor mkha' 'gro bye ba 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang
NK040(thi)044:280: // thugs dam bskangs gyur dbang dang dngos grub stsol //
NK040(thi)044:281: ces dam chos sdug bsngal zhi byed kyi bka' bab pha dam pa rgya gar dang /
NK040(thi)044:282: bdud bzhi tshar gcod kyi bka' bab ye shes kyi
NK040(thi)044:283: mkha' 'gro ma lab kyi sgron ma bcas kyi rnam
NK040(thi)044:284: thar dang 'brel ba'i bskang ba 'di yang lnga tsho
NK040(thi)044:286: ma dang mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i gnas mchog kah thog
